#summary Outline of the designer interface
#labels Assignment2,Feature

Our program will define a "Buddy" class which developers can extend to make their own buddies. All buddies will be written using the Java programming language.

The buddy class will contain the following:
  # A JFrame object
  # A JPanel object
  # A method that records the user data properly
  # A method that displays a menu and returns the choice chosen
  # A method that loads images
  # A method that loads music clips
  # A basic image displayer
  # A basic sound player
